II.1.1.wording: PL optionally moves to ending after Indri not before ADJ/ABL3

II.1.2.wording: PL moves to stem after ṣäpna before NOM/ACC

II.2.1.wording: Träṅk are green before V before Opt except weak GER2

II.2.3.wording: Mläṅk are black before V not before Imp/Opt/IPF/PRIV

II.2.5.wording: yom, śäy are red before V+Imp

II.2.7.wording: enz, twās and red verbs are gray before V+Ipf

II.2.8.wording: vān is green before V not before Ipf/IMP

II.2.14.wording: Violet verbs except Wäl/mäsk/met are blue not before V+Ipf

II.2.17.wording: yām, śāw are pink before V+Ipf

II.2.19.wording: käläw is optionally gray before V+Ipf

II.2.20.wording: krop is optionally black before V+Prs

II.2.24.wording: Pink käläw is M before V+Ipf

II.2.25.wording: läg is M before V not before Ipf

II.2.26.wording: Violet verbs are M before V + PrsEnd

II.3.2.wording: Short verbs are yellow before K+Opt

II.3.4.wording: wätk, päl are red before K+Prt

II.3.5.wording: Short verbs in -k, -q are optionally red before K before Prt

II.3.8.wording: näk is red before K not before Ipf

II.3.11.wording: Ṣärp are optionally green before K+Opt

II.3.12.wording: spārtv is optionally green before K+Prs

II.4.4.wording: Forms with X+V are deleted if verb X does not permit V

II.4.5.wording: Forms with X+K are deleted if X does not permit K

II.4.6.wording: Forms with X+V~MID are deleted if X’s voice doesn’t have M

II.4.7.wording: Forms with X+V~ACT are deleted if X’s voice doesn’t have A

II.4.8.wording: Forms with X+K~MID are deleted if X’s causativity doesn’t have V and voice doesn’t have M

II.4.9.wording: Forms with X+K~ACT are deleted if X’s causativity doesn’t have V and voice doesn’t have A

II.4.10.wording: Forms with IMP+X are deleted if X ≠ 2

II.4.11.wording: Forms where PL/DU in ending is followed by ADJ are deleted

II.4.12.wording: Forms where EMPH is not preceded by voice/case are deleted

II.6.20.wording: tāk → nas before V + Prs, INAN4, GER2

II.7.5.wording: vä → väṣtă when final and before NOM

II.8.3.wording: Add -ont to p before gender not before DU / SG+NOM

II.8.7.wording: Add -c to qä not before NOM/GEN

II.8.8.wording: Add -c to ywār not before NOM

II.8.9.wording: Add -k to ywār before any morpheme except NOM

II.8.15.wording: Marginally add -āw to neṣ before NOM

II.8.16.wording: Add -ñ to umpar before gender not before SG+NOM

II.8.17.wording: Add -`äy to olăr, ratg before PL

II.8.18.wording: Add -e` to pracăr, ANIM2 before PL

II.9.4.wording: In ānăndā and anăpr optionally ă → a

II.9.6.wording: u → ä in ṣula before INDECL

II.9.7.wording: Optionally ur → ru in ṣurmă, purccamāw

II.9.8.wording: F → ñā` after Zen, which lose their -e

II.9.9.wording: In Vidyādhare the last letter is optionally dropped not before F

II.9.12.wording: In Kinnare -e → i optionally before PL

II.9.18.wording: In śrāddhe optionally e → ă before NMZ

II.11.1.wording: kāsäwă → krant before gender not before SG+NOM

II.12.10.wording: PPP, mkältāwr lose r before gender/NMZ/DU/PL and when strong

II.12.11.wording: PPP loses r after K before NOM/ACC

II.12.12.wording: PPP loses r after K before SG+NOM/ACC

II.12.13.wording: GER1, GER2 lose ă before NMZ, ADJ, PL not in W_śwāl, W_rkäl, W_el

II.13.4.wording: d → d` in ORD after ālăk~

II.13.5.wording: d → d` in ORD before gender except M+SG+NOM

II.13.6.wording: Add an to ORD after vä before INS/LOC

II.13.7.wording: Add an to ORD after vä before M+SG+INS/LOC

II.13.8.wording: Add an to ORD after ālăk+vä optionally

II.13.9.wording: Add an to ORD after vä optionally before M+SG not before NOM/GEN

II.13.13.wording: Add i to TEN before ORD

II.14.1.wording: ADJ → `äy after Ñäkta, which lose their final -kă/-a/-ā

II.14.3.wording: ADJ → nt`äy after ṣme/qlewā/atră, before which wā→Ø, ă→o

II.15.26.wording: ANIM1 → ă after värs~ before PL, ~GEN

II.15.27.wording: ANIM1 → ā after läg~, and läg becomes azure

II.16.1.wording: INAN1 → `i not after causativity, and before it äw drops

II.16.4.wording: QUAL1 → assäw not after causativity (before which ime → yme)

II.16.7.wording: REL1 → om not after causativity except ṣäpna

II.17.15.wording: REL2 → äy after wäsā, before which ā drops

II.17.16.wording: In QUAL1 ss → s after Klop~

II.18.1.wording: QUAL2 z → ză after mă INAN1 before F+PL

II.18.3.wording: In ANIM1 ā drops before F

II.18.4.wording: Add -āw to REL3 in -m before M+SG+NOM optionally

II.18.5.wording: Add āt- to ANIM1 after säqă

II.18.6.wording: Add z- to NMZ, BAH1, REL3, QUAL3 after Omälă

II.18.7.wording: Add az- to NMZ, BAH1 after Ekäră

II.18.8.wording: Add az- to NMZ, BAH1 after āk optionally

II.18.11.wording: NMZ → ñe after purccamāw, which loses -āw

II.18.19.wording: NMZ drops between ortā and BAH1 optionally

II.18.20.wording: NMZ drops after Kāsäwă optionally not before PL

II.18.21.wording: NMZ drops after kārme optionally before PL

III.1.3.wording: IMP is PrsEnd after black verbs before ~PL

III.1.4.wording: IMP is PrtEnd after black verbs before ~SG

III.1.5.wording: IPF → e and PrsEnd after y/tāk+V

III.2.3.wording: 1 → wa in stem before DU, PL

III.2.4.wording: 2 → ya in stem before DU, PL

III.2.5.wording: 2 → s before PL+ACT not after PrsEnd

III.2.11.wording: In stem, person X → nä before Y+OBL, if X = 3 or Y = PL

III.2.12.wording: Person X drops before Y+OBL, if X = 3 or Y = PL

III.3.2.wording: PRT/IPF drop after violet verbs not before 3+SG+ACT

III.3.3.wording: PRT/IPF drop after red verbs before ~ACT except 3+SG+ACT

III.3.4.wording: PRT drops optionally after yām+V before 1/2+SG+MID

III.5.2.wording: Add -ant to ārkäy before gender, except ~SG+NOM and F+SG

III.5.4.wording: Marginally add -n after -äy (except Täräy), -we, -te before gender+SG+NOM

III.5.5.wording: Add -n after -äy (except Täräy), -we, -te before M not before SG+NOM

III.5.6.wording: Optionally add n after -äy (except Täräy) before F not after ñäkta, not before SG+NOM

III.5.8.wording: Add -in preferably after PLUS/TEN+ORD before M not before SG+NOM

III.5.10.wording: Add -änt after w/m/mān before M not before ~NOM

III.5.11.wording: Add -änt after strong w/m (except śom) not before ~NOM

III.5.12.wording: Add -änt after w/m/mān before F/DU (except in PPP before F+SG)

III.5.14.wording: Add -äs` after strong w before PL+NOM

III.5.15.wording: Add -s after w/nt before F not before PL

III.5.16.wording: Add -s after nt of lānt/ANIM1/PPM before F+PL

III.6.1.wording: M → e` before PL not after n, nt, y, s` or long vowels

III.6.2.wording: M → ă after 3 before SG not before ~NOM

III.6.3.wording: M → äṣa after 1 not before PL / SG+GEN/OBL

III.6.4.wording: F → `äqa after 1 not before PL / SG+GEN/OBL

III.6.8.wording: F → ă optionally between lānt and PL

III.6.10.wording: F → y after ś/z and GER1/GER2 before SG+NOM

III.6.11.wording: F → ñcā after ā not in adjectives

III.7.1.wording: SG → än in ending after gender/name/strong (except after ṣomă, native t, vä+ORD+M) not before NOM/GEN

III.7.2.wording: SG → än optionally after śtwarā+ORD+M not before NOM/GEN

III.7.3.wording: SG → än after mäśkitā before ACC

III.7.4.wording: SG → än after p+M not before NOM/GEN

III.7.5.wording: SG → än after kāsäwă+M optionally not before NOM/GEN

III.7.6.wording: SG → än after lānt+F optionally not before NOM/GEN

III.7.8.wording: SG → `äwa after 2 in stem not before NOM/GEN/OBL

III.8.7.wording: DU → i after masculine creatures/strongs before NOM/ACC not after vowels or y

III.8.8.wording: DU → i after p+M before NOM/ACC

III.8.9.wording: DU → e after p+F before NOM/ACC

III.8.12.wording: DU drops between päśśă and ADJ

III.8.13.wording: DU drops after p not before gender

III.9.4.wording: PL → äntäw in stem after nouns/numerals

III.9.8.wording: PL → äwā in stem after Prār

III.9.9.wording: PL → ntäw in stem after weaks in -i/-o

III.9.10.wording: PL → ntäw optionally after weaks/numerals in -a, waṣtă, arthă before NOM/ACC/INS

III.9.11.wording: PL → ` in stem after weaks in -ā

III.9.13.wording: PL → nt in stem after ă/a of nouns (not Säqă) before NOM/ACC/INS except W_zpok before INS

III.9.14.wording: PL → nt optionally in stem before INS after weak lă/ră (not Säqă)

III.9.15.wording: PL → äwā after W_cmol before NOM/ACC/ADJ

III.9.17.wording: PL → `äy in ending before NOM not after F

III.9.19.wording: PL → ñ in ending before NOM after V(`)/y

III.9.20.wording: PL drops after nt+F not before GEN

III.9.21.wording: PL drops after non-weak native e`/o`/s`/t before ~NOM

III.9.24.wording: PL → yu marginally in stem after “p/m/w+e” before NOM/ACC

III.9.25.wording: PL → äw marginally after āṅkăr before NOM/ACC

III.10.1.wording: Add -n after ă/a of qualitatives/ṣomă/sasăk before F+PL, and thep PL drops

III.10.2.wording: Add ṣ- to 2 after PrtEnd before SG+ACT

III.10.3.wording: Add ṣ- to 3 after PrsEnd before SG+ACT

III.12.2.wording: GEN → u after ālăk, which loses -ăk

III.12.3.wording: GEN → śśäy after PL~ (not in stem)

III.12.4.wording: GEN → śśäy optionally after PL in stem

III.12.7.wording: GEN → e after DU~ not after doubles/p

III.13.1.wording: GEN → y after ā/ā`/u/ū (not middle/weak/double/kayurṣā/qlewā) + SG

III.13.2.wording: GEN → āp after masculine genders/strongs/names (not Ñäkta, -ā`,u,ū) + SG

III.13.6.wording: GEN → i after non-masculine names (except metrăk) in consonant + SG

III.13.7.wording: GEN → es after ă/a of names/strongs/creatures + SG except oṅkă

III.13.11.wording: GEN → es optionally after käntwā + SG

III.13.12.wording: GEN → e marginally after kapśăñyā, oppălā + SG

III.13.13.wording: GEN → e preferably after C_pättāñkät + SG

III.13.14.wording: GEN → s after name/creature in -e/-i/-ī + SG or strong in -e except ANIM1

III.14.2.wording: INS → äkyo optionally between DIST and EMPH

III.14.3.wording: LOC → ane in stem and after 3

III.14.4.wording: LOC ane → anne optionally not before ABL3/ADJ

III.14.5.wording: COM → śäl optionally after än after i/ī/e/ā/ā` of strongs/names

III.14.7.wording: ABL3 → aśśi after indeclinable except anăpr

IV.2.1.wording: Change ă to gender’s form before k + FEM (not in ālăk), and then gender optionally → Ø

IV.2.2.wording: Change ă to gender’s form in ālăk before FEM+SG+NOM, and then gender optionally → Ø

IV.2.3.wording: Optionally change ă to gender’s form before k + M+PL+ACC, and then gender → Ø

IV.2.4.wording: Change ă to gender’s form before k + M+PL, and then gender → Ø

IV.3.3.wording: In spārtv marginally ä-ablaut before K+PRT

IV.3.7.wording: a-ablaut not in Bäl, Pāś, läg, päwtk, täṅk and verbs with “ä + liquid + stop” if the morpheme (not Ipf/Prt) after causativity starts with z or vowel except ä

IV.3.14.wording: In violet verbs ā→a before V+Ipf

IV.3.17.wording: In Bäl ā-ablaut before V not before Ipf/ārā

IV.4.3.wording: Add -n to säy optionally before Imp

IV.4.7.wording: Add -s to āy optionally before V+PRT+3+PL+ACT

IV.4.9.wording: Add -än to Päk, Wäl (not -n) before V+Ipf

IV.4.10.wording: Add -än to gray käläw before V+Ipf

IV.4.12.wording: Add -n to gray/blue Räy before V+Ipf

IV.4.13.wording: Replace last letter with -n in blue Kät before V+Ipf

IV.4.15.wording: kn → äṅk after obstruents in verbs

IV.4.17.wording: śn → nś in pāś before V+IPF

IV.4.18.wording: śn → n in pāś not before V+IPF

IV.4.19.wording: Add n to green verbs before ~Opt except träyk,zärk+K+GER2+NMZ

IV.5.1.wording: Pink verbs not in -y/-s/-ñ are blue before V+Imp/Opt

IV.5.4.wording: Long blue verbs are red before ~PPP

IV.6.1.wording: After red/violet verbs causativity → äsä before ā, except IMP+2~ACT

IV.6.3.wording: Causativity → ă after blue verbs before IPF

IV.6.4.wording: Causativity → ă after pink/yellow verbs not before INAN/QUAL1/REL1

IV.6.5.wording: Causativity → äsă after gray verbs not before INAN/QUAL1/REL1

IV.6.6.wording: Causativity → iññă after ṇäw before Ipf

IV.6.7.wording: Causativity → äññă after yäks before Ipf

IV.6.8.wording: Causativity → äññă after Kās not before INAN1

IV.6.10.wording: V → äññă after āks, oks, väy not before Ipf

IV.6.11.wording: V → optionally äññă after āks before OPT

IV.6.12.wording: V → optionally äññă after oks before PPP

IV.6.14.wording: V → isă after āks, oks before Ipf

IV.6.16.wording: V → ā after śāw before PPM

IV.7.1.wording: K äsă drops before Imp after short verbs except Läg

IV.7.2.wording: V  äsă drops before QUAL2 after rät

IV.8.1.wording: Empty causativity → ā after blue verbs not before vowels or `ä

IV.8.2.wording: V → o after täm before weak GER2

IV.8.3.wording: Causativity Ø → `a after violet spārtv not before IPF

IV.8.4.wording: Causativity Ø → a after violet verbs not before PRT/IPF, except after näk before OPT

IV.8.5.wording: Causativity Ø → ä not before vowels or mă/`ä

IV.9.2.wording: zā → z in PRIV before M+SG

IV.10.2.wording: In short violet verbs a-ablaut before ~PRT~MID

IV.10.3.wording: In short blue/red verbs (except pälzk) a-ablaut before V before IMP~SG+ACT

IV.10.4.wording: In short blue/red verbs (except pälzk) optionally a-ablaut before V before IMP~PL+ACT

IV.10.5.wording: In Wäl a-ablaut before K before IMP+2+SG+ACT

IV.10.6.wording: In Wäl a-ablaut before K optionally before IMP+2+PL+ACT

IV.10.7.wording: In short red verbs a-ablaut before K+CON

IV.10.9.wording: In short blue verbs a-ablaut before V+CON~SG+ACT

IV.10.10.wording: In short blue verbs a-ablaut before V+PRT~PL+ACT

IV.10.11.wording: In short blue verbs (without ä+l/y/k+C) `ä-ablaut before V+PRT~SG+ACT

IV.12.1.wording: In verbs aL → La between C(`) and s/ṣ/z

IV.13.1.wording: In red verbs l is palatalized before K+Imp

IV.13.2.wording: In red verbs tk is palatalized before K+PRT

IV.13.3.wording: In Pälg l is palatalized before K+Imp/INAN3

IV.14.1.wording: In tämp initial palatalization not before ~INAN1

IV.14.2.wording: In tärk, spārtv initial palatalization before ~INAN1

IV.14.3.wording: In läq, läwtk initial palatalization before _+Imp/Opt

IV.14.4.wording: In täm, qäm initial palatalization before V+Opt

IV.14.5.wording: In täk initial palatalization before V+Ipf

IV.14.6.wording: In zär initial palatalization before V+GER1

IV.14.7.wording: In Kärs initial palatalization before K

IV.14.8.wording: In spärk optional initial palatalization before K

IV.14.9.wording: In läwt optional initial palatalization before K+Opt

IV.14.10.wording: Initial palatalization of z-/ṣtäm before K (not äsă) + Imp

IV.14.11.wording: In gray läm initial palatalization before K+Imp

IV.14.12.wording: Optional initial palatalization of t-/l-/n- (not in läm) before K (not -să) + Imp

IV.15.2.wording: Add pä- to läg before V not before Ipf/IMP/ANIM1

IV.16.2.wording: Consonant reduplication before ~PPP not in blue verbs

IV.16.3.wording: Consonant reduplication before K+PRT not in red/long verbs

V.1.1.wording: In causativity -ä → -ă before CON before N not after k

V.1.2.wording: In causativity -ä → -ă before PRS before N after qāk, täk

V.1.3.wording: Optionally K ä + PPP w → Ø+Ø before PL

V.2.1.wording: Add y- to ā in endings after k/g/d`/wāz

V.2.2.wording: Add y- to ā in endings (except MID) after ă except mă (and GER before F)

V.2.3.wording: Add y- to ā in endings (except MID, F) after kā

V.2.4.wording: Add -yä to -e, -i, -o before vowel of case, um, äw, änt

V.3.1.wording: ă, a (not strong, ñäwa, ñäkta) drop before un (which becomes on), än, äw, y, e

V.4.1.wording: Long vowel (+ n) drops before u of NMZ

V.5.1.wording: ä,ă drop after V(`) not in postfix and not before nt

V.6.1.wording: e, ă → ` between l and F ā

V.7.2.wording: V̄ drops before V̄ (and all ` between them)

V.8.1.wording: t/l are palatalized not in weak/numeral/middle morphemes before PL (except 3 before ~MID)

V.8.2.wording: t/l are palatalized in ālăk, mättăk before M+PL

V.8.4.wording: -t (not bhe) in Śātă is palatalized before M+SG not before ā

V.8.5.wording: l is palatalized optionally in ālăk before M+SG not before NOM

V.8.7.wording: t/l are palatalized in ālăk, mättăk before F+SG

V.9.1.wording: Marginally PL äs → es if both after nt` and after masculine morphemes

V.12.3.wording: Bhi ā, a drop after “non-first vowel (not ä) + consonant (+ `)”

V.12.6.wording: Add -a before ṣ in Kṣur optionally

V.13.1.wording: Bhe ā → Ø in EMPH optionally

V.14.1.wording: w → y after e/y not before ā/äs

VI.1.1.wording: Optionally ă → a before PPM (not after ā/a/e/o + any number of C/ä)

VI.2.1.wording: ă → ä in V after tāk before l

VI.2.2.wording: ă → ä in causativities after w/y/v + (`) before non-nasal consonants

VI.2.7.wording: ă → `ä in causativities not before nasal

VI.3.1.wording: yä drops before m with sāry

VI.3.2.wording: yä not before w → e with kary

VI.4.1.wording: Before PL ṇt` ä → i, ā/ă/a → e

VI.6.1.wording: ä/ă → Ø after “vowel + w/v/y” (v only in native, not in skāy before äs) not in INAN4 not before y, w, r, ṭ, k, sk, ṣäy

VI.6.2.wording: ä/ă → Ø after “consonant + w” not beforey, w, r, ṭ, k, sk, ṣäy

VI.6.3.wording: ä of verbs → Ø after “vowel + w”

VI.7.1.wording: ā/a/ă/e + bho y → e not before `

VI.8.1.wording: wā drops after ā if w belongs to verb

VI.9.1.wording: All not-first ā/a → ä in reduplicated verb

VI.9.2.wording: If the first vowel is long, and the second vowel is a/ā in bāt/tense/causativity/verb (not pink), the latter → ă not after enz

VI.9.3.wording: After enz V ā → optionally ă not before l

VI.10.1.wording: ayä → e, avä → o before ṭ

VI.11.2.wording: yp` → ya before C and äl

VI.12.1.wording: ăw drops if w belongs to 1

VI.12.2.wording: āw drops if w belongs to 1 optionally

VI.13.1.wording: w → u between obstruent and consonant

VI.13.2.wording: ă → u after “ä + liquid” before PL nt

VI.14.1.wording: Stops are geminated before word-final r marginally

VI.15.1.wording: Bhu drops in 1 after IPF after red/violet~

VI.15.2.wording: Bhu drops in 1 after PRT after red/violet~ optionally

VI.15.3.wording: Bhu drops in PRT/IPF not after `ä/äy

VI.15.4.wording: Bhu drops in PRT/IPF after green~

VI.15.5.wording: Bhu drops in PRT after käläw~ optionally

VI.17.1.wording: Optionally F ā drops after ñäkta+ADJ before SG+ACC

VI.18.2.wording: V äsä → äzä optionally after āl

VI.19.1.wording: ṣ → āṣ in ADJ after ~PL/DU/LOC not after y, ysār, kanwe

VI.19.2.wording: ś → āś in GEN after ~PL not after s,y

VI.20.1.wording: Not in the first syllable ă → ä if the next vowel is not ä, except mättăk before yāp

VI.20.2.wording: ă → ä before PPA (not after v`les+V) before vowel other than ä, unless the previous vowel is ä/i (but the one before it is not a)

VI.20.3.wording: ă → ä before PPA after pāś+V if the next vowel is not ä

VI.23.1.wording: äy → ä in läyp before K+PPP+gender

VI.23.2.wording: äy → o in kāv`älte not before V

VI.23.3.wording: Bho y → i after ä or consonant(+`)

VI.23.4.wording: Bho v/w → u after ä or consonant(+`)

VI.23.6.wording: -äy → -iy in INF before vowel of F/case

VI.23.7.wording: -äy → -iy before vowel of F/case after ñäkta, -w`

VI.23.8.wording: -äy → -iy before vowel of F/case optionally after päqälā

VII.2.1.wording: Bha y → Ø after e/i not in verb

VII.2.2.wording: Bha y → Ø after e/i in M_ske

VII.3.4.wording: Before ` in native morphemes (except Ātäl) and Brāhmăṇā: k/q/z/ṣ → ś, l → λ, n/ṅ/ṇ → ñ, t → c, s → ṣ

VII.5.1.wording: Add ä- to bha s after C(`) except r/s

VII.5.2.wording: Add ä- to bha s/c of not after C except ṣ

VII.5.3.wording: Add ä- to bha ṣ after ṣ of käläw

VII.5.4.wording: Add ä- to bha obstruent after a different obstruent, unless they are “sibilant + ṭ/t/p”

VII.5.5.wording: Add ä- to bha -ṣ after Vk optionally

VII.5.6.wording: Add ä- to bha t, ṣ after m,λ,ñ

VII.5.7.wording: Add ä- to bha n,l,r,λ after a consonant other than w (+ `)

VII.5.8.wording: Preferably bha n → än after r in NMZ

VII.5.9.wording: Bha m → äm after a consonant other than m, r, ñ

VII.6.1.wording: ṣ → s in PROX if there is s in the word

VII.7.1.wording: After n of POS än → Ø

VII.8.1.wording: ä drops not before “consonant not before vowel”

VII.9.1.wording: Optionally än → Ø after n/ṇ (which then becomes n) (not of qualitative roots) not in the second syllable

VII.9.2.wording: Optionally ān → Ø after in of ADJ not in the second syllable, if ā is part of F

VII.9.5.wording: n/ṇ optionally drops before n of SG

VII.11.1.wording: v → w preferably after vowel before vowel of another morpheme

VII.12.1.wording: y → ś optionally after ś of Ñäkta

VII.12.2.wording: y not in case → preferably ṣ after ṣ of native morphemes

VII.12.3.wording: y not in case → c after c of native morpheme

VII.12.4.wording: y → c after c of bāt optionally

VII.13.1.wording: Optionally itk → ätk in verbs except yätk

VII.14.1.wording: wā → we, pw → p in vān

VII.14.2.wording: zk → sk after V in pälzk

VII.15.4.wording: Optionally in DU/PL änt → nt before vowel/w after “long +  l,r,y,w preceded by at least one syllable”

VII.16.1.wording: Bha y → Ø after e/i not in verb optionally before DU/PL

VII.16.2.wording: Bha w → Ø not in verb

VII.17.1.wording: Bhe nasal → Ø in vān, vä, DU after we/wu not after n

VII.19.1.wording: Add ä after С before “liquid + C” (except rrC)

VII.19.3.wording: Add ä after k before lñl optionally

VII.20.3.wording: VC1ñC2 → VC1äñC2 unless 1) C1 = ñ, 2) C1 = stop and C2 is l/m

VII.21.1.wording: y → i after consonant not before vowel.

VIII.1.1.wording: ä drops not before “consonant not before vowel”

VIII.1.3.wording: Optionally ä → Ø in ñäkta after buddha`

VIII.1.4.wording: Marginally ä → Ø after initial “w/t/p before s/p/k + r + vowel” (except päpr-)

VIII.3.2.wording: s → ṣ before ṣ not of ADJ

VIII.3.3.wording: p assimilates to ṣ/w/z/c after m preferably

VIII.3.4.wording: In śäw/bäk~PPP tp, pk → pp, kk

VIII.3.7.wording: After m, nasals/p assimilate to sibilant and c

VIII.4.1.wording: Degeminate consonants not before vowel or r

VIII.5.1.wording: Sibilant + c → śś in native morphemes

VIII.6.2.wording: In verse ä drops not in the last syllable if its deletion doesn’t cause an impermissible cluster

VIII.6.3.wording: In verse e drops and y + vowel other than ä if its deletion doesn’t cause an impermissible cluster

VIII.6.4.wording: i- → y- in ime, eśe in verse

VIII.10.1.wording: är → rä (not after r) optionally at word-end if the resulting cluster is permissible

VIII.11.1.wording: ä → u after q of säqă

VIII.13.2.wording: woC → waC in wätg before K + weak PPP

VIII.13.3.wording: woC → waC in wätg before u PPP optionally

VIII.14.8.wording: n/ṅ → ñ before ñ/ś after V not in kroṅśe

VIII.15.2.wording: Optionally iy → y before V in Ṣiyak

VIII.17.1.wording: n/ṇ → ṃ after V word-finally and before sibilant

VIII.17.6.wording: Optionally nasal → ṃ before consonant if both belong to Arämpāt.

VIII.18.1.wording: Degeminate consonants after a consonant except tt after n

VIII.20.1.wording: ä → u before “any number of C + q”

VIII.23.1.wording: Marginally n of PL drops after y/l before t

VIII.23.2.wording: Marginally stops are geminated after V before rV

VIII.23.3.wording: Marginally t is geminated after Vr before V
